name: AnaplasmosisTestsForAnaplasmaSpeciesIgGAntibody
title: Anaplasmosis (Tests for Anaplasma species IgG Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Anaplasma species IgG Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Anaplasma species IgG Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
